title: Mega-mashup: Discovery clears $30 billion bond to finance WarnerMedia deal, a bullish sign for a rattled market - MarketWatch
content: Mega-mashup: Discovery clears $30 billion bond to finance WarnerMedia deal, a bullish sign for a rattled market  MarketWatch
description: Investors pile into Discovery's $30 billion corporate bond deal on Wednesday to help fund its mashup with AT&T's WarnerMedia. The deal is tied for the...
